original_title: VeggieTales: Saint Nicholas - A Story of Joyful Giving
overview: Laura Carrot's Christmas stocking might be empty this year. Her dad is in danger of losing his job.  While Larry thinks a letter to the North Pole should fix the problem, Bob knows what will really help... and tells the story of a little boy named Nicholas who made a discovery in Bethlehem that changed Christmas forever.
title: VeggieTales: Saint Nicholas - A Story of Joyful Giving
